entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who feels anxious about how rude the Dursleys might be to the Weasleys. He knows that Mr. and Mrs. Weasley usually wear long robes in varying states of shabbiness.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a person who wears long robes in varying states of shabbiness.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is a person who wears long robes in varying states of shabbiness.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is a person who puts on his best suit to look impressive and intimidating.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is a person who looks diminished due to the diet not taking effect.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about how rude the Dursleys might be to Mr. Weasley.
Harry is concerned about how rude the Dursleys might be to Mrs. Weasley.
Mr. Weasley and Uncle Vernon have opposite styles of dressing, with Mr. Weasley wearing long robes in varying states of shabbiness and Uncle Vernon wearing a suit.
Mrs. Weasley and Uncle Vernon have opposite styles of dressing, with Mrs. Weasley wearing long robes in varying states of shabbiness and Uncle Vernon wearing a suit.
Dudley is affected by the diet not taking effect, making him look diminished.
